Question: Despite two triple-doubles from this person during the series, finals MVP Jordan led his team to a 4–1 win.
Hints: In 2006 this person created a contract food service with Sodexo USA called Sodexo-Magic.
During the Finals, this person averaged 18.0 points on .560 shooting, 13.6 assists, and 7.7 rebounds per game.
At the age of 36, this person attempted another comeback as a player when he re-joined the Lakers during the 1995–96 NBA season.
